aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: Hi! I'm Ígara Yasmin, I'm a Computer Engineer. Over the past few years I've dedicated my studies and my career to the field of software development, deepening my expertise in various programming languages, frameworks and agiles methodologies. I've worked on diverse projects, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams, particularly in the frontend where I used Angular, React.js and WordPress. Besides, my college education has provided me with a strong foundation in programming fundamentals in several languages like Python, Java, and C in diverse contexts. I'm excited to take on new challenges, explore exciting opportunities, and continue to grow as a professional. If you are interested in collaborating or learning more about me, please feel free to get in touch!

card1.title: Software Developer
card1.item1: Front-end web development of CRUD systems and websites using HTML, CSS, React.js, JavaScript, Wordpress;
card1.item2: Back-end development of CRUD systems using Node.js with mongoDB and MySQL databases;
card1.item3: Development of conversational flows using zenvia flow;
card1.item4: Development of the requirements document of a project related to municipal education;

card2.title: Front-end Developer
card2.company: STTP - Superintendency of Traffic and Public Transportation
card2.item1: Front-end web development of CRUD systems and websites using HTML, CSS, Angular, TypeScript, Bootstrap;
card2.item2: Back-end web development of CRUD systems using Node.js with mongoDB;
